name: dreamful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
full of dreams: dreamful sleep His nights of dreamful sleep started to affect his work. Some patients complained not of insomnia, but of dreamful sleep. Opposite
dreamless
like a dream, or having the qualities of a dream: The poem has a dreamful beginning. The dreamful quiet of the garden lulled her busy mind. Synonym
dreamlike Related word
dream
More examplesFewer examplesDreamful sleep is not always restful.He woke up frequently from a dreamful sleep.This exercise will help you fall into a dreamful sleep.
